About Us

Gepard data transformation platform connects manufacturers with retailers, automatically transforming and delivering product information worldwide

Our mission is to help e-commerce businesses overcome their data challenges

First data project as a part of Bintime software company

2005

Bulding expertise in e-commerce data optimization & automation

2008

Evolving into the separate company. Gepard Syndicator launch.

2015

Gepard PIM launch

2017

Gepard Fusion. New data solution launch

2019
Expertise

15 years in the data transformation industry

Location

4 global offices

Clients

50+ clients worldwide

Products

120+ million descriptions transformed per month
